description: Open Source alternative for managing distributed nodes in a backup cluster environment. Implement Cluster Manager, Backup Manager and nodes Users, nodes, backups to let users interact with the cluster manager interface.

n8n workflow to suggest youtube videos after assessing the transcript of videos.
A Python project which detects pneumonia from images of chest X-rays based on generative adversarial networks.
